summary: In 1952, during the Korean War, two American pilots become bitter enemies over the same woman but must shelf their personal feud when confronted by deadly Chinese MIG fighter jets in battle.
cast: Robert Mitchum|Robert Wagner|Richard Egan|May Britt|Lee Philips|John Gabriel|Stacy Harris|Victor Sen Yung|Candace Lee|Aki Aleong|Jimmy Baya|Slosson Bing Jong|Brad Brown|John Caler|Spencer Chan|Vinnie De Carlo|John Doucette|Jay Jostyn|Whamok Kim|Paul King|Frank Kumagai|Esther Ying Lee|Mabel Lim|Leon Lontoc|Mae Maeshire|Ralph Manza|Nobu McCarthy|Alena Murray|Ron Nyman|Robert 'Bob' Olen|Robert Reed|George Sasaki|Nina Shipman|Mary Song|Walter Soo Hoo|Rachel Stephens|Norman Stevans|Frank Tang|Larry Thor|Kam Tong|Chiyo Tota|James Yagi
keywords: korean war|jet fighter|based on novel|dysfunctional marriage|romantic rivalry
title: Entre dos pasiones
